name: Hello Charlotte EP3: Childhood's End
description:
Synopsis
Charlotte's story has ended. Charlotte's story has began.
A prologue. An epilogue.
An end. A beginning.
All ended well.
There was nothing to be sad about.
Info
Hello Charlotte: Childhood's End is the third installment of Hello Charlotte series.
It's a visual novel-esque psychological thriller with sci-fi and puzzle elements.
Available for download in English and Russian.
Warnings
This game contains strong language, body horror, violence and mature themes.
If you're under the age of 15 or are uncomfortable with any of the mentioned above, this game might not be recommended for you to play. Please proceed at your own discretion.
